column2: omnis terra~; servíte Dòmino in laĕtìtia. Introíte in conspèctu ejus in exsultatióne. ^ Sing joyfully to God
column3: all the earth~; serve ye the Lord with gladness~; come in before his presence with exceeding great joy.

column1: 3 ^ Scitóte qŭóniam Dòminus ipse est Deus. Ipse fecit nos
column2: et non ipsi nos~; pòpulus ejus
column3: et oves páscuaĕ ejus. ^ Know ye that the Lord he is God. He made us
column4: and not we ourselves~; his people
column5: and the sheep of his pasture.

column2: átria ejus in himnîs. Confitémini illi~; laŭdáte nomen ejus
column3: ^ Go ye into his gates with praise
column4: into his courts with hymns. Give glory to him~; praise ye his name

column3: et usqŭe in generatiónem et generatiónem vèritas ejus. ^ for the Lord is sweet
column5: and his truth to generation and generation.
